title: Tasty Cantonese Chicken Recipe
content:
Cantonese chicken is one of the easiest chicken you could ever make. It tastes delicious with rice, noodles or fried rice. It is sweet and salty and tastes so delicious.

I tasted this chicken in a restaurant and it was served over a bed of rice. I enjoyed it so much, I thought of recreating it at home. I searched online and the recipe was pretty simple and basic.

 

Cantonese Chicken Recipe

Prep time: 5 mins

Cook time: 15 mins

Total time: 20 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Chinese

Serves: 2 to 3 servings

 

Ingredients

Boneless Chicken - 500 grams

Oyster Sauce - 2 tablespoons

Dark Soy Sauce - 1 tablespoon

Vinegar - 1 teaspoon

Sugar - 1 tablespoon

Salt to taste

Oil - 2 tablespoons

Garlic - 1 tablespoon chopped finely

Ginger - 1 tablespoon chopped finely

Onion - ½ cup chopped finely

Chicken Stock or Water - 1 cup

Cornflour / Cornstarch - 1 tablespoon

 

Instructions

Take chicken, soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar, salt, and vinegar in a bowl and mix well.

Heat oil in a pan, add ginger, garlic, and onions. Saute for a min.

Add in the chicken and stir fry for 2 mins.

Add in chicken stock and bring it to a boil. Simmer for 5 mins.

Now add in cornflour which is mixed with water into this. Stir well. Cook till it is thickened as per your liking.

Serve it over rice.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
